global_caption: a scene featuring a woman taking a picture of the sky with her camera, wearing a sky blue sleeveless one-piece dress and white slippers, holding a vacation hat and smiling; a cool man with a muscular build wearing sunglasses, a white shirt, beige pants, black men's formal shoes, and a wristwatch, with one hand in his pocket, looking at the woman while holding a paper map; a man wearing a green t-shirt, beige short pants, and black men's formal shoes with his hands in the pockets of his pants and wearing a wristwatch, looking at the woman; a woman wearing a pink and sky blue flower-patterned short-sleeves blouse, short jeans, and black slippers, holding a red coffee cup and luggage, looking at the woman; and a street of a European city with yellow buildings, a palm tree in the corner, and some parasols.
